function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of medical resources in severe epidemic areas","Impact":"Inadequate care for patients, increased risk of infection spread","Mitigation":"Redistribute medical staff, increase logistics supply, implement non-contact distribution of subsistence goods","Technologies":"5G ultra-low latency for remote control, real-time information for transportation of emergency materials","People":"Patients, medical staff, local residents","Owner":"Government, medical institutions, logistics providers"},{"Description":"Delay in transmission synchronization","Impact":"Unbalanced distribution of medical staff, slow response to epidemic spread","Mitigation":"Implement 5G communication for remote control and intelligent production, real-time information for transportation of emergency materials","Technologies":"5G ultra-low latency communication, remote control systems","People":"Medical staff, transportation personnel","Owner":"Manufacturers, transportation companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate supervision of charitable materials","Impact":"Misuse or mismanagement of charitable materials, lack of transparency in donation process","Mitigation":"Establish real-time supervision and broadcasting of donation process, use 5G network for live broadcast","Technologies":"5G network, real-time broadcasting systems","People":"Donors, recipients of charitable materials","Owner":"Red Cross Society, TV station, China Unicom"}]}
